@reece988, piinmu, twitchey94, dever898
you have all the same problem, please read the comments above, this issue where solved many times.
1. First you have to install COD MW2 (Razor, SKIDROW), jump this step if you have a rip or steam downloaded version.
2. Follow the instructions in the txt
3. You have to copy all the COD MW2 files in the folder "Server"
if you have installed the game you can find the COD MW2 files in c:\program files\activision\call of duty moder warfare 2
if you have a ripped version or a steam downloaded you have to go in the folder where you placed the game and copy all the files from there to "Server" folder

you have the error "no iwd files in \main" because you do not copy the COD MW2 files in the folder "Server" or you copy it partially

first copy all the COD MW2 files in "Server" folder (C: \Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\zero gear\Server)  than copy the folder "zero gear" (that you have downloaded from this torrent, it's under Multiplayer Online") in the folder "C: \Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common" overwriting the existing files

if it give you again the error "no iwd files in \main" go in the folder where you have installed COD MW2, copy the folder called "main" and paste it in "C: \Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\zero gear\Server
